[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Estado de situación financiera [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:UndrawnBorrowingFacilities, uni:OtrosCompromisosAdquiridos, uni:CapitalNoExigido, ifrs-full:RightofuseAssets, uni:PropiedadDeInversionAlquiladaBajoArrendamientoOperativo, ifrs-full:SubordinatedLiabilities, uni:GarantiasFinancierasDadas All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 10 - Resultado [resumen] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 01 - Estado de situación financiera [resumen] includes the concept ifrs-full:IssuedCapital in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called uni:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:CategoriesOfFinancialAssetsAxis, ifrs-full:ClassesOfOrdinarySharesAxis, ifrs-full:ClassesOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAxis. The statement presentation group 01 - Estado de situación financiera [resumen] includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:IssuedCapital. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table uni:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable:
ifrs-full:IssuedCapital = 663,708,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table uni:StatementOfFinancialPositionTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept IssuedCapital is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:IssuedCapital Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 3522
